code: import{Box,FormControl}from"@mui/material";import React,{useState}from"react";import{useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{handleAmountChange}from"../redux/actions";import{Unstable_NumberInput as NumberInput}from"@mui/base/Unstable_NumberInput";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TextFieldComp=()=>{const dispatch=useDispatch();const[value,setValue]=useState("");const handleChange=val=>{setValue(val);dispatch(handleAmountChange(val));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{mt:3,width:"100%",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FormControl,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NumberInput,{placeholder:"Number of Questions",value:value,onChange:handleChange})})});};export default TextFieldComp;
